 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָלַל‎</span>] **verb Pi\`el** ==speak, utter, say== (Late Hebrew Pi\`el ***id.***; Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (and many derivatives ), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַלֵּל‎</span>; perhaps compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> IV. ***dictate*** (a letter, etc.), (<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">) <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> IV ***id.*** [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>ZMG xi. 1886, 725</sup>); — 

**Pi\`el** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִלֵּל‎</span> [[Gen.21.7|Gen 21:7]] compare 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַלּוֺתִי‎</span> ([[BDB#Ew|Ew]]<sup>§274 b. N</sup>) as **proper name** below; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִלֵּ֑לוּ‎</span> [[Job.33.3|Job 33:3]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְמַלֵּל‎</span> [[Ps.106.2|Ps 106:2]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּמַלֶּלֿ‎</span> [[Job.8.2|Job 8:2]] — say, followed by direct quotation + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> of indirect object [[Gen.21.7|Gen 21:7]] utter, object <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דַּ֫עַת‎</span> [[Job.33.3|Job 33:3]] compare [[Job.8.2|Job 8:2]] object <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גְּבוּרוֺת י‎</span> [[Ps.106.2|Ps 106:2]]. 



 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָלַל‎</span>] **verb** ==rub, scrape== (Late Hebrew ***id., rub*** ears of wheat, ***scrape***); — only **Qal** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוֺלֵל‎</span> in <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֹרֵץ בְּעֵינָו֯ מוֺלֵל בְּרַגְלָ֑ו֯ מֹרֶה בְּאֶצְבְּעֹתָיו‎</span> [[Prov.6.13|Prov 6:13]] ***he that winketh with his eyes, that scrapeth with his feet*** (making signs), etc., so [[BDB#De|De]] [[BDB#Now|Now]] [[BDB#Str|Str]] &lt; [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#Wild|Wild]] from I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מלל‎</span> ***that speaketh with his feet***.
